sentences.sContent: ...Many social and cultural factors play roles in determining which promising students get on the path toward international math recognition...
...professors teach promising K-12 students advanced mathematics for several hours after school or on weekends...
...I've been following some of the promising ideas emerging to address and prevent family homelessness...
...Only in this way can we have a promising future!...

synos.tran: 许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式）

phrases.pCn: n. 发展前景；光明的前途
发展潜力大的市场；有销路的市场

remMethod.val: 来自promise(n. 诺言， 成功的征兆)

words.tran: 充满希望地；大有可为地
允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望

trans.tranCn: 有希望的， 有前途的
trans.tranOther: showing signs of being successful or good in the future
